```py
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv('time series data.csv')
df.head()
```

```py
pd.melt(
    df,
    id_vars=["t"],
    value_vars=["ProductP1", "ProductP2"],
    var_name="Product",
    value_name="Sales",
) 
```

```py
pd.melt(
    df,
    id_vars=["t", "price"],
    value_vars=["ProductP1", "ProductP2"],
    var_name="Product",
    value_name="Sales",
) 
```
